cards.rules_text:
[i](As a Mission enters, choose an opponent to protect it.)[/i]
When Scout the Investors enters or is defeated, surveil 2, then draw a card.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Nimstone and LionBank fund the prison. Sentinel insures it. Post a call to hit up their offices, let's see how quick they drop.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
[i](As a Mission enters the battlefield, choose an opponent to protect it.)[/i]
When Capture on Camera enters or is defeated, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Don't aim it at me - photos get us locked up. But I'm game for a little exposé. Let's make sure these fascists never have a job again.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
[i](As a Mission enters, choose an opponent to protect it.)[/i]
When this battle enters or is defeated, it deals 3 damage to target player and 1 damage to up to one target creature they control.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“This was all redwoods before construction. Dormant seed cones that only open after wildfires. Let's see if we can make it hot enough.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
[i](As a Mission enter, choose an opponent to protect it.)[/i]
When Augustine Border Medicine Run enters or is defeated, return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. You gain 3 life.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Off to visit my pals up north - insulin, estrogen, and epinephrine.” [/i]

cards.rules_text:
[i](You protect a Barricade.)[/i]
Creatures you control get +1/+1. If you control eight or more nonland permanents, they get +2/+2 instead.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Before the protests, the plaza was empty concrete, a monument to alienation. Now it has a kitchen, a library, and a dance floor.” [/i]

cards.rules_text:
[i](You protect a Barricade.)[/i]
Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, it gets +1/+1 and gains menace and deathtouch until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Camp life is good. I wash dishes, keep watch, play guitar. If
a pipeline is sabotaged in the night, I don't ask who did it.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
[i](You protect a Barricade.)[/i]
Once each turn, when a land enters under your control, put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Life moves slow on a tree sit. It's just us, the tree, the loggers shouting down below. Sure beats working retail.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: Put a +1/+1 counter and a flying counter on target creature. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to it this turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“When police finally breached the hall, we took to the rooftops, leaving our banners hanging from the eaves. Zero arrests.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: Whenever you cast a spell during an opponent's turn, if Afterhours Intruder has 2 or less power, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“While they work, we scout out the site. After dusk, we make our move.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
First strike
The second time a creature you control enters each turn, creatures you control get +2/+0 and gain vigilance until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“People are uncomfortable with anger. They prefer we politely ignore the loss of the forest, the violence of the cops. I'm over it.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: Lens Busting deals 3 damage to any target. Up to one target creature you control can't be blocked this turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Whoever takes down the most security cameras by sunrise gets the big bedroom at the squat!”[/i]

cards.rules_text: When this creature enters, you may vouch. When you do, put target card from your graveyard on top of your library. [i](To vouch, tap another untapped creature you control or pay {2}.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]“People need meds. But all these pharma companies care about is profit.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: Create a token that's a copy of target permanent you control with mana value 3 or less.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Look for abandoned lots and sidewalk edges with clear southern sun. A metal stake keeps mowers away. Water weekly for three summers, and it will fruit for fifty more.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever this creature attacks, you may discard a card. If you do, defending player loses 3 life.
Rouse {2},{B},{R} [i](You may cast a copy of this card from your graveyard for {2},{B},{R} plus exiling this card. Copies enter as tokens.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]“A good affinity group is priceless.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Cautious Assembly enters, draw a card, then discard a card.
{1},{U},{U},{U},{U}: If Cautious Assembly has no counters on it, put three +1/+1 counters and a vigilance counter on it.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“If her policies keep one of us housed or out of jail, we are stronger for it.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
{B},{B},{B},{B}: Put two +1/+1 counters on Bitter Assembly. Draw a card. Each player loses 2 life. Activate only once.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“If the cops hate her so much, why not? I like my enemies divided and frustrated.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Once each turn, when Agitative Assembly becomes the target of a spell or ability you control, it deals 2 damage to each opponent.
{R},{R},{R},{R}: Put two +1/+1 counters and a menace counter on Agitative Assembly. Activate only once.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“A progressive frontrunner means they're feeling the pressure. Let's keep pressing.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Creatures you control with +1/+1 counters on them have trample.
{G},{G},{G},{G}: Put three +1/+1 counters on Steadfast Assembly. Activate only once.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Our strength is in an unwavering relation to dominating powers: Against.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Bustling Avenue enters tapped unless you control a basic land.
{T}: Add {W}.
{1},{W}, Discard Bustling Avenue: Create a 1/1 Rebel creature token that is all colors.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]/ In concrete depths beset by beasts of steel /
— Poem from “Art For Buried Forests” zine[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Distro Culinaire enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
{W},{U},{B},{R},{G}: Distro Culinaire deals 3 damage to each opponent and you gain 3 life.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“A distro is more than just a hot meal. It's a place to share our needs and capacities, build community beyond our cliques, make art. But let's be real - people come for the food.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flooded Underpass enters tapped unless you control a basic land.
{T}: Add {U}.
{U}, Discard Flooded Underpass: Tap or untap target creature. Surveil 1.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]/ we live and die, forgotten by the sun /
— Poem from “Art For Buried Forests” zine[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Crumbling Alley enters tapped unless you control a basic land.
{T}: Add {B}.
{B}, Discard Crumbling Alley: Exile target card from a graveyard. Each opponent loses 1 life.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]/ and sell our years to dream of something real /
— Poem from “Art For Buried Forests” zine[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Roaring Interstate enters tapped unless you control a basic land.
{T}: Add {R}.
{R}, Discard Roaring Interstate: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]/ to burn the past and seek an ancient home /
— Poem from “Art For Buried Forests” zine[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Overgrown Backroad enters tapped unless you control a basic land.
{T}: Add {G}.
{G}, Discard Overgrown Backroad: Target creature gets +0/+5 until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]/ where dirt might grant our bodies to return. /
— Poem from “Art For Buried Forests” zine[/i]

cards.rules_text: Choose target creature you control. If creatures you control attacked two or more players and/or battles this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on the chosen creature. Then it deals damage equal to its power to another target creature.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“They can't stop us everywhere at once.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Scouting Bike enters, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle.
{3}, Discard a card: Scouting Bike becomes a creature until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Cheap, fast, anonymous - and fun.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains flying until end of turn.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“If there's any chance of trouble, you know I'll have masks, a first aid kit, and my skateboard.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: Discard your hand, then draw two cards. You may cloak a card from your hand. [i](Put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature with ward {2}. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Bought in cash and kept off my usual wifi networks. Worth it to avoid surveillance.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Enchant creature
When In the Public Eye enters, draw a card. Then choose Innocuous or Intimidating.
• Innocuous — Enchanted creature is a 1/1 Citizen and has defender.
• Intimidating — Enchanted creature is a 3/3 Horror and has flying.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Rulers portray us as scary ‘cause they're scared.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Choose one —
• Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn.
• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“At midnight, at prisons across the country, we welcome the new year by singing and drumming and shouting for abolition, so the victims of state violence know they aren't alone.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When this creature enters, choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Create two 1/1 Rebel creature tokens that are all colors. They gain haste until end of turn. Exile the tokens at the beginning of the next end step.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Capture the flag. Karaoke. Board games. Am I the only anarchist who sleeps?”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Enchant creature
Vouch: Tap enchanted creature. [i](To vouch, tap an untapped creature you control or pay {2}.)[/i]
When three or more creatures you control have tapped to vouch for Come to Consensus this turn, sacrifice Come to Consensus and put enchanted creature into its owner's library fourth from the top.

Whenever Camp Rooster attacks, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
{1}: Camp Rooster gains flying until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“The camp resisting the pipeline has a lot I didn't expect. Like chickens.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
As long as it isn't your turn, spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Experienced Trespasser can't be blocked unless defending player pays {2}.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“The vulnerable arteries of empire - power lines and parked fleets and shipping cranes - are often shockingly easy to reach.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: Whenever you discard a card, target creature can't block this turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“The district pays more to have cops in every station than it ever makes on fares. It targets homeless folks and hides city infrastructure in an illusion of capitalism. So I jump as counter- propaganda. Also ‘cause I'm broke.” [/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, skillshare. [i](Another target creature you control gains the following ability until end of turn.)[/i]
Discard a card: This creature gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“They have no evidence you did anything. Stay quiet and we'll get you out today.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
{W},{U},{B},{R},{G}: Skillshare. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](Another target creature you control gains the following ability until end of turn.)[/i]
This creature gets +1/+1 for each differently named land you control.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“If finding endangered species on the easement can slow construction, I'll find them.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Wayward Station enters tapped. When it does, you may discard a card or sacrifice a land. If you do, draw a card.
{T}: Add one mana of any color a land you control could produce.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“It hurts to leave, with camp destroyed like this. But I'll see you at the next barricade.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Create two 1/1 colorless Drone artifact creature tokens with flying. 
You gain 4 life.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Water, granola bars, soup, chocolate, toilet paper, two new books, art supplies, more cards. That should keep the tree sitters going for another few days.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
{1},{R}, Discard Angle-Grinder Rascal: Skillshare. [i](Another target creature you control gains the following abilities until end of turn.)[/i]
Double strike
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Locks, fences, you name it — just make sure you have the right disc and a good battery, and the rest is all fun and sparks.”[/i]
[i]“The cops were really struggling to cut through it to get me off that bulldozer — I was impressed, I told them maybe I should get one for my bike!”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Z-Rox Zine Machine enters, draw a card.
Sacrifice Z-Rox Zine Machine: The next time a creature you control becomes the target of a skillshare ability this turn, copy that ability for each other creature it could target. Each copy targets a different one of those creatures.
The second time a creature you control enters each turn, Queer Defiance deals 3 damage to each opponent.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“They want to ban it, co-opt it, define it and defang it and sell it back to us. But we refuse to fit in boxes, we keep each other safe, and if you come swinging we bash back.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control. Create a Treasure token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
Rouse {1},{R} [i](You may cast a copy of this card from your graveyard for {1},{R} plus exiling this card.)[/i]

Once each turn when a face-down creature you control dies, you may return it to your hand. You may return it to the battlefield face-up instead if it is a permanent card and you control another face-down creature.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Catching charges from the pipeline action cost me my career, my house, everything. I survived because friends and strangers were there for me.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Defender
Whenever Advocate of the Jailed becomes tapped, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
{5},{U}: This turn, creatures you control can attack as though they didn't have defender.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Imprisoned doesn't mean forgotten.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Once each turn, when you cast a noncreature spell, skillshare. [i](Another target creature you control gains the following ability until end of turn.)[/i]
This creature can't be blocked.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“With a little know-how, you can cross the country without spending a dime.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, draw a card. Until end of turn, spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“We set up about forty radio nodes across the city, all encrypted. Centralized comms won't work in any real crisis, but this will.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Reach
{W},{U},{B},{R},{G}: Put two +1/+1 counters on Rooftop Gardener and create a 2/2 green Goat creature token. Activate only as a sorcery and only once.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“How can we free ourselves from empire if we can't feed ourselves without it?”[/i]
cards.notes: art looks funny looks like from video game

cards.rules_text:
Diversity of Tactics deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell.

cards.flavor_text: [i]“If we all agreed, we'd be too predictable.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Soup-Table Gossip enters with two +1/+1 counters on it if you didn't cast it from your hand.
Rouse {3},{G} [i](You may cast a copy of this card from your graveyard for {3},{G} plus exiling this card. Copies enter as tokens.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Did you hear about the plaza?”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Squatters' Rebuke deals 4 damage to target creature.
This card has rouse {1},{R} if you discarded it this turn. [i](You may cast a copy of it for {1},{R} plus exiling it from your graveyard.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]“This wannabe slumlord kept sending his security at us. We dumped piss on him.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Haste
When Unvetted Punks enters, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step unless you vouch before that step. [i](To vouch, tap another untapped creature you control or pay {2}.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]“They've certainly got the spirit.”[b][/b][b][/b][b][/b][/i]

Once each turn, when you cast a noncreature spell, skillshare. [i](Another target creature you control gains the following ability until end of turn.)[/i]
Whenever this creature attacks, it deals 2 damage to defending player.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“The server is wiped. You're safe.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
{4}, {T}, Sacrifice Kitchen Crew's Propane: It deals 3 damage to target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“We mostly cook for local encampments. But at a pipeline blockade? Absolutely!”[/i]
cards.notes: flavor text \: when its empty throw it at the cops

cards.rules_text:
Whenever Co-op Free Pile or another artifact you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on Co-op Free Pile.
{1}, {T}: Move a +1/+1 counter from Co-op Free Pile onto target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.

{T}, Sacrifice Ashes of the Precinct: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle.
{1}, Exile Ashes of the Precinct from your graveyard: Add one mana of any color.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“People say we can't defeat the cops, here in the belly of the beast. But I haven't forgotten.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
[i](You protect a Barricade.)[/i]
When Carvhill Crane Lockdown enters, exile another target nonland permanent until Carvhill Crane Lockdown leaves the battlefield.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Every day we set back construction of the prison is a victory.” [/i]

cards.rules_text: When DIY Shield Crew enters, create a colorless equipment artifact token named Painted Shield with “Equipped creature gets +1/+2” and Equip {3}.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Authoritarians love uniforms. It helps them feel like soldiers who follow without question. But for us, every shield is unique.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Barricade Raisers enters, look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal a battle card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Whenever a battle enters under your control, create a 1/1 Rebel creature token that is all colors.

Toolshare Collective enters with a +1/+1 counter and a lifelink counter on it if you control an artifact.
If you would create one or more artifact tokens, create an additional one of those tokens.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“It's like a library. But for drills.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Untap up to two permanents you control during each other player's untap step.
Whenever you cast a spell during an opponent's turn, surveil 2.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“On a good night, we talk and watch the moon rise over the trees. On a bad night — well, we keep watch for a reason.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
Rouse {1},{B},{G} [i](You may cast a copy of this card from your graveyard for {1},{B},{G} plus exiling this card. Copies enter as tokens.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Fuck resilience! I'd prefer rest.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Youth Uprising enters, create X 1/1 Rebel creature tokens that are all colors. They gain haste until end of turn.
Creatures you control that entered this turn have indestructible.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“It's our future on the line. If adults aren't going to do something about it, we will.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Iron-Spike Arborists enters, search your library for a land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle.
{1},{R},{G}, Sacrifice a land: Put a menace counter on this creature and it deals 3 damage to any target. Activate only once.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Tell the loggers - this forest lives.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: Whenever a creature you control becomes tapped, if it isn't attacking, put a discretion counter on it. The next time it attacks, remove all discretion counters from it and it can't be blocked this turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“It doesn't matter how good your VPN is if you can't keep your mouth shut.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Haste
{T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, untap this creature and it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Free zines don't print themselves.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When this creature enters, you may discard a card.
Whenever you discard one or more cards, this creature deals 2 damage to any target.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“This is only the burn line, a little ash to send a message to the industries that brought us entire seasons of fire.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:

Flash
When Postcards and Commissary enters or is defeated, untap target creature and put a +1/+1 counter on it.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“We come through for political prisoners. Even if they're innocent.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: Target creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn. When it dies this turn, cloak it. [i](To cloak a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature with ward {2}. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Flag removed. Time to change outfits.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: Exile each creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard face-down. Shuffle those cards, then cloak them. Whenever you attack, if you control another artifact, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“If the sheriff wants to clear us out of camp, he can do it on foot.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever you discard a card, skillshare. [i](Another target creature you control gains the following ability until end of turn.)[/i]
Menace
cards.flavor_text: [i]“San Tavio keeps pushing working people out. But with the plaza occupation, techies left downtown and rent is down.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When you cast this spell, copy it for each battle you controlled that left the battlefield this turn.
Distribute two +1/+1 counters among creatures you control. Draw a card.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Well. That didn't exactly go as planned.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: When Bail-Fund Signatory enters, you may vouch twice. If you do, return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. [i](To vouch, tap another untapped creature you control or pay {2}.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]“The world pitches in. You get out.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
The second time a creature you control enters each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature and you gain 1 life.
Rouse {4},{W} [i](You may cast a copy of this card from your graveyard for {4},{W} plus exiling this card. Copies enter as tokens.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Chanting isn't for the media or at the fascists harassing us. It's to hold us together.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
[i](You protect a Barricade.)[/i]
At the start of combat on each turn, if you cast a spell this turn, you may tap target creature.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Block the cranes, lock down if you have to. Dockworkers are
on our side. No war profiteer gets to ship bombs from my city.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
[i](You protect a Barricade.)[/i]
Discard a card: Draw a card. Activate only as a sorcery and only once each turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“For fifty years, Morgan Park has welcomed people as they are, when nowhere else in San Tavio does. May it live fifty more.” [/i]

cards.rules_text:
When this creature enters, you may vouch. If you do, you gain 2 life. [i](To vouch, tap another untapped creature you control or pay {2}.)[/i]
Rouse {5},{G},{G} [i](You may cast a copy of this card from your graveyard for {5},{G},{G} plus exiling this card. Copies enter as tokens.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]“When their van pulled up, I was skeptical. But these hippies have grown on me.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: Return up to three target battle cards from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“The companies investing in building the Carvhill prison made their money from arms deals and tar sands, extortionate healthcare and incarcerated labor. Fighting one piece of empire means fighting against all of them.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Vigilance
When Pump-Station Vandal attacks, if you control a battle, it gets +2/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“I wish the future didn't depend on it. I wish it didn't have to be me.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever Pseudonymous Messenger becomes tapped, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
{1},{B}: Pseudonymous Messenger gains deathtouch until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“I don't know who's behind the username. But they really saved us back there.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, vouch three times. [i](To vouch, tap an untapped creature you control or pay {2}.)[/i]
Gain control of target creature. That creature's owner discards a card.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“I feel sure he's not a fed. But I don't know if he can keep it together under stress.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Once each turn, when a card leaves your graveyard, skillshare. [i](Another target creature gains the following ability until end of turn.)[/i]
Lifelink
cards.flavor_text: [i]“I'm not a substitute for a hospital. But I can meet people where they're at.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: Mill five cards. You may put a permanent card from among the cards milled this way into your hand.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Things are clear from the skycamp. I used to think society would all rebel, when the right line was crossed. Now I see we choose where to make our stand. This is mine.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: When this creature enters, you may vouch. If you do, create a tapped colorless land token named Trustworthy Venue with “{T}: Add one mana of any color.” [i](To vouch, tap another untapped creature you control or pay {2}.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Who would host 300 anarchists?”[/i]

cards.rules_text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. You may discard a card. When you do, each opponent discards a card.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Feels good to give the pigs a taste of their own medicine. Just don't burn your hands on the canisters. And don't get caught.”[/i]
cards.notes: picture of someone kicking tear gas cannister

cards.rules_text:
Create a 1/1 Rebel creature token that is all colors. You lose 1 life and draw a card.

cards.rules_text: When Caluma Easement Trailblazer enters, you may exile a basic land card you own from outside the game or the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play the exiled card.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“We need a camp. But where?”[/i]

cards.rules_text:

• Create a colorless artifact token named Lockpick with “{T}, Sacrifice this token: The next spell you cast this turn can be cast as though it had flash.”
• Create a token that is a copy of an artifact token you control.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Paystubs, rent history, it's all there.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever Statue Topplers attacks, you may tap target creature.
{3},{W},{W}, Discard Statue Topplers: Exile target artifact, enchantment, or creature. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.rules_text: Return up to one target creature or land card from your graveyard to your hand. Create a 1/1 black Bat creature token with flying and lifelink.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“The city has tried three times now to board up and padlock the entrance. Every attempt gets cut down within days.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:

cards.rules_text:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control a battle, skillshare. [i](Another target creature you control gains the following ability until end of turn.)[/i]
Vigilance
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Place. Time. Number of police. Activity. Equipment. Clarity makes safety.”[/i]

cards.flavor_text: [i]“The spectacle of election can't go uncontested. While they vote, we take the streets.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:

cards.flavor_text: [i]“We don't know each other. It's safer that way. But every day fresh paint calls for liberation, and we know we aren't alone.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: Cloak the top card of your library, then return a creature you control to its owner's hand unless you pay {1}. [i](To cloak a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature with ward {2}. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]“I'm prepared for risks. But I map the exits.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:

cards.flavor_text: [i]It watches all. It knows much. But it does not know that it can touch the world.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flying

cards.rules_text:

cards.flavor_text: [i]It stalks its victims everywhere. To the protest, to the concert, in a stranger, in a lover. Behind the facade, the barrel takes aim.[/i]

cards.rules_text:

Whenever an opponent casts a spell, that player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
cards.flavor_text: [i]It sees only the bank statement, the interest owed, the potential shareholder revenue. It asks only how dry you can bleed.[/i]

cards.flavor_text: [i]It's starring live on all channels, viral on every feed, and running for office on both sides of the ballot.[/i]

cards.flavor_text: [i]Dripping with guilt and certain it cannot change its noxious ways, it runs from any hint of a better world.[/i]

cards.flavor_text: [i]Perform your role, or face its thorns.[/i]

cards.rules_text:

cards.flavor_text: [i]— For the rebels and the dreamers, the prisoners and the outcasts. For those that love too hard, think too hard, and don't know how to give up.[/i]
